original_text: And when he knocked at the door of the gateway, a servant girl named Rhoda came to answer.
korean_text: 베드로가 대문을 두드린대 로데라 하는 여자 아이가 영접하러 나왔다가

sentences.original_text: And when he knocked at the door of the gateway
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 문간 문을 두드렸을 때,

sentences.original_text: a servant girl named Rhoda came to answer.
